summary: It\"s just amazing,,,but i say sorry again for the previous version
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/15067-1-1334417876.gif[/img]

[size=15]
HD sky re-upload
[/size]
        

        *Hi guys now this is the fully checked and new version .....
             --I solved many problems of previous version. 
             --now in this version i have retextures every cloud ,,and their are no black  lines on the 
                borders of clouds. More detailed ,more sharpen ,and more better colour.
            --All the broken textures are fixed. 
             --Default cloud textures are of \"512*512\"  and my textures are \"1112*1112\".
                Not fully \"hd\" but most better than the default
             --Stars are more brighten and detailed. Default textures \"512*512\" my
                textures \"1112*1112\". 
             --constellation stars are more visible in the sky.
             --Sun textures are just amazing ,with a orangy glow colour.

[size=7]
[color=blue]
             Note-I have made two types of version -
                                   1- Lite version {dose not contain denser clouds}
                                   2-Denser clouds {sky with denser clouds}
[/color]
[/size]

            - My mod \"Lite version\" can be used with ultra realistic world lighthing
            - But \"denser version\" is not compactable with the above mod 



    
      ------------ I hope this version will impress you all--------------
author: Hritik master
